name: Fuente y Padron - Legends Padron
additionalNotes: In an unprecedented event for the cigar industry, the Fuente and Padrón families have joined together to create a unique tribute to their patriarchs. This exceptional collaboration combines the experience and tradition of both families, resulting in a line of cigars that represents the best of both worlds. This project is not only a business collaboration, but a tribute to Carlos Fuente Sr. and José Orlando Padrón, who laid the foundations of the
